question: I'm 38 y/o w/ type 2 diabetes and been married for 13 yrs. blessed w/ 2 kids. We've been trying to have another baby and its been a year. and I'm wondering if it's because of my diabetes. i need to get help on how i can get pregnant again. what medicine do i need to take? Is it true that  women w/ diabetes is less fertile? hope somebody can help. thanks
title: pregnancy
